  • Uses of Item in com.tloj.game.collectables

    Subclasses of Item in com.tloj.game.collectables
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    PurchasableItem
    An abstract class representing an item that can be purchased in the game via Merchant
    This class is meant to be extended by specific purchasable items, guaranteeing modularity
    class 
    Weapon
    An abstract class that represents a weapon that can be used to attack enemies
    Different weapons have different effects that are applied to the target when they are hit
    They are also equipped with a Dice that is rolled to determine the damage dealt to the target (in addition to the player's base damage stat).
    Methods in com.tloj.game.collectables that return Item
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Item
    Item.getRandomItem()
    Used to get a random item based on their drop chances.

  • Uses of Item in com.tloj.game.collectables.items

    Subclasses of Item in com.tloj.game.collectables.items
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AttackElixir
    Represents the Consumable Item "Attack Elixir" in the game.
    The Attack Elixir can boost the attack stat of the player of 4 for the duration of a fight, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.2, with an in game cost of 15
    class 
    DefenseElixir
    Represents the Consumable Item Defense Elixir in the game.
    The Defense Elixir can boost the defense stat of the player of 4 for the duration of a fight, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.2, with an in game cost of 15
    class 
    Emp
    Represents the Consumable Item EMP in the game.
    The EMP allows the player to skip trap rooms, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.1, with an in game cost of 35
    class 
    GreatHealthPotion
    Represents the Consumable Item Great Health Potion in the game.
    The Health Potion can restore the Health Points of the player by 50, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.3, with an in game cost of 18
    class 
    GreatManaPotion
    Represents the Consumable Item Great Mana Potion in the game.
    The Great Mana Potion can restore the Mana of the player by 30, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.3, with an in game cost of 18
    class 
    HealthPotion
    Represents the Consumable Item Health Potion in the game.
    The Health Potion can restore the Health Points of the player by 20, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.2, with an in game cost of 10
    class 
    ManaPotion
    Represents the Consumable Item Mana Potion in the game.
    The Mana Potion can restore the Mana of the player by 10, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.2, with an in game cost of 10
    class 
    NorthStar
    Represents the Consumable Item NorthStar in the game.
    The NorthStar can print the entire game map, it can be found as a special reward.
    It weighs 0.0
    class 
    Ragu
    Represents the Consumable Item Ragu in the game.
    Item Ragu restore all HP and Mana, boosts def stat and the damage inflicted by a 2 factor for the duration of a fight, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 1.0, with an in game cost of 0
    class 
    SpecialKey
    Represents the Consumable Item Special Key in the game.
    The Special Key opens a special locked loot room, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.0, with an in game cost of D
    class 
    WeaponShard
    Represents the Consumable Item Weapon Shard in the game.
    The Weapon Shard upgrades the current weapon of the player if given to a smith, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.5, with an in game cost of 40

  • Uses of Item in com.tloj.game.collectables.weapons

    Subclasses of Item in com.tloj.game.collectables.weapons
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CyberKatana
    Represents the CyberKatana Weapon in the game.
    It comes without an effect.
    class 
    LaserBlade
    Represents the LaserBlade Weapon in the game.
    It comes without an effect.
    class 
    NaniteLeechBlade
    Represents the NaniteLeechBlade Weapon in the game.
    It is paired with the HealthAbsorber ability
    It weighs 0.8 and is equipped with a D12
    class 
    NanoDirk
    Represents the NanoDirk Weapon in the game.
    It is paired with the DiceReroller ability, that allows its holder to roll twice its dice per attack
    It weighs 0.5 and is equipped with a D6
    class 
    PlasmaGreatsword
    Represents the PlasmaGreatsword Weapon in the game.
    It comes without an effect.
    class 
    PulseStaff
    Represents the PulseStaff Weapon in the game.
    The PulseStaff is an rare heavy weapon with a long blade that can be found in the game.
